Sniper   

   Sniper was confuse. "You took me as prisoner yet you let me walk 
down to the brig, of the ark alone. I could run off and get away from 
all of you. I could break into the bridge. All of you need to learn 
how to handle prisoners better. So who is me escourt to the brig.
Hmm, 
or are you just going to let me walk off. Ohh and you also have to 
tell the autoguns not to fire on me. All of you need to figure out
how 
to handle every situation." Sniper waited for answers. When he got 
back into the maximal ranks, he was going to have to train these two.
